entry.title: San Francisco rolls out AI-powered cameras to combat crime
entry.summary: Tech expert Kurt “CyberGuy" Knutsson discusses San Francisco deploying three advanced mobile surveillance cameras to deter crime in high-risk areas.

entry.title: Cruise ship surgery that slices giants for mega profits
entry.summary: A whopping 30 million people will have taken cruises in 2024, and some ships being built to keep up with this demand cost as much as $2 billion.

entry.title: Y Combinator is being criticized after it backed an AI startup that admits it basically cloned another AI startup
entry.summary: A Y Combinator startup named PearAI launched with a tweet thread and YouTube video on Saturday and caused an immediate backlash.

entry.title: The VC buying up prized real estate in SF says not to ‘listen to agitators’
entry.summary: VC Neil Mehta, the Greenoaks Capital co-founder tied to a growing number of building purchases across several blocks of San Francisco’s once-glittering Fillmore Street, defended himself on Monday via an op-ed in The San Francisco Standard, saying the moves are solely about revitalizing a “city that has given me more than I could ever give.

entry.title: Cybertruck Finally Gets Full Self-Driving (Supervised)
entry.updated: Mon, 30 Sep 2024 18:55:00 +0000 Some owners of Tesla’s electric pickup truck paid for the feature when they purchased it last fall—and now it’s starting to kick in.
